title: GTA 5
aboutTheGame: Grand Theft Auto V is an action-adventure game played from either a third-person or first-person perspective. Players complete missions—linear scenarios with set objectives—to progress through the story. Outside of the missions, players may freely roam the open world. Composed of the San Andreas open countryside area, including the fictional Blaine County, and the fictional city of Los Santos, the world is much larger in area than earlier entries in the series.

minimumConfig.processor: Intel Core i3-4130 or Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-6100
minimumConfig.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 (DDR4) or AMD Radeon RX 550

recommendedConfig.processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD FX-8300
recommendedConfig.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (VRAM 3GB) or AMD Radeon RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
aboutTheGame: Red Dead Redemption 2 for PC is an action adventure, open world game in which the player can roam freely with some elements playing out in third person, others in first person play modes. The player can commit crimes, but must then be prepared for law enforcement to hunt them down, ready to bring to bear the full weight of the law on the miscreant!

minimumConfig.processor: Intel Core i3-4130 or Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-6100
minimumConfig.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 (DDR4) or AMD Radeon RX 550

recommendedConfig.processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD FX-8300
recommendedConfig.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (VRAM 3GB) or AMD Radeon RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)

title: Mafia 3
aboutTheGame: Part three of the Mafia crime saga - 1968, New Bordeaux, LA. After years of combat in Vietnam, Lincoln Clay knows this truth: family isnt who youre born with, its who you die for. When his surrogate family is wiped out by the Italian Mafia, Lincoln builds a new family and blazes a path of revenge through the Mafioso responsible.

minimumConfig.processor: Intel Core i3-4130 or Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-6100
minimumConfig.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1030 (DDR4) or AMD Radeon RX 550

recommendedConfig.processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD FX-8300
recommendedConfig.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (VRAM 3GB) or AMD Radeon RX 570 (VRAM 4GB)

title: FIFA 22
aboutTheGame: FIFA 22 for PC is the thirtieth release in the franchise of the massively popular soccer simulation video game series, following along the real life ups and downs of players and teams from all over the world, using real life motion capture from the players and combining it with state of the art graphics and physics engines so each game leaves you as drained as though you played for real!

minimumConfig.processor: Intel Core i3-6100 @ 3.7GHz or AMD Athlon X4 880K @4GHz
minimumConfig.graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB

recommendedConfig.processor: Intel i5-3550 @ 3.40GHz or AMD FX 8150 @ 3.6GHz
recommendedConfig.graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon R9 270X

title: Minecraft

title: Call Of Duty Black Ops
aboutTheGame: About This Game The biggest first-person action series of all time and the follow-up to last year’s blockbuster Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare 2 returns with Call of Duty®: Black Ops. Call of Duty®: Black Ops will take you behind enemy lines as a member of an elite special forces unit engaging in covert warfare, classified operations, and explosive conflicts across the globe.

title: Ghost of Tsushima
aboutTheGame: Discover the expanded Ghost of Tsushima experience in this Director’s Cut, featuring all additional content released to date. - Uncover the hidden wonders of Tsushima in this open-world action adventure. - Forge a new path and wage an unconventional war for the freedom of Tsushima

title: Elden Ring
aboutTheGame: Elden Ring for PC is an action role playing game (ARPG) written by superstars George R R Martin (the author of the Song of Ice and Fire series of books which begat television show Game of Thrones) and Hidetaka Miyazake (who is famed for many popular video games: from the Souls series, to Bloodborne, to Sekiro amongst many others).

minimumConfig.processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
minimumConfig.graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB

recommendedConfig.processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
recommendedConfig.graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB

title: Sniper Elite 5
aboutTheGame: Sniper Elite 5 for PC is a third person tactical shooter/ stealth game. Fans of the franchise will be delighted to, once again, take on the persona of Karl Fairburne, who, this time, journeys to France in 1944: initially to meet up with the French Resistance with a view to getting home, only to be drawn into a plan to take down a recently uncovered Nazi project called ‘Project Kraken’.

minimumConfig.processor: Intel CPU Core i3-8100 or equivalent
minimumConfig.graphics: DirectX12 capable GPU with 4GB VRAM

recommendedConfig.processor: Intel CPU Core i5-8400 or equivalent
recommendedConfig.graphics: DirectX12 capable GPU with 6GB VRAM

title: Dying Light 2 Stay Human
aboutTheGame: About This Game Over twenty years ago in Harran, we fought the virus—and lost. Now, we’re losing again. The City, one of the last large human settlements, is torn by conflict. Civilization has fallen back into the Dark Ages. And yet, we still have hope. You are a wanderer with the power to change the fate of The City. But your exceptional abilities come at a price.

recommendedConfig.processor: Intel CPU Core i5-8400 or equivalent

title: The Quarry
aboutTheGame: As the sun sets on the last day of summer camp, the teenage counselors of Hackett’s Quarry throw a party to celebrate. No kids. No adults. No rules. Things quickly take a turn for the worse. Hunted by blood-drenched locals and something far more sinister, the teens' party plans unravel into an unpredictable night of horror.

title: Playerunknown's Battlegrounds
aboutTheGame: Playerunkown’s Battlegrounds for PC is an online multiplayer Battle Royale type game. Battle Royale games are massively multiplayer gatherings where everyone who joins in battles it out to be the last man standing and ultimate victor. Up to one hundred players enter the game by parachuting onto an island where they immediately start scavenging for weapons and tools to give themselves the edge over the other players. The unwary are despatched promptly as everyone is out for themselves, so be careful and make sure you watch your back at all times!

title: Sims 4
aboutTheGame: The Sims 4 (Europe) for PC is a life simulation management game, the best-selling game of 2014 and 2015, and at one point topped the charts across all formats. There are many Sims games, from main games like this one to the frequent expansion packs and add-ons: all proving the enduring popularity of the series. As with the other games and expansion packs in the series, you control the life of your Sims completely – or almost completely – as they go through life, buying or building a home, getting a job or getting into the dating scene. There were no defined story arcs in the original game, but later expansion packs and add-ons issued challenges to the Sims, giving them missions to perform or career paths to follow. This game is still largely a sandbox game which gives you plenty of scope to decide what your Sims should be doing with their lives.

title: Life is Strange Remastered
aboutTheGame: About This Game Experience the BAFTA award-winning story of Life is Strange now beautifully remastered with enhanced visuals and vastly improved animation using mocap technology. Play as Max Caulfield, a photography senior who discovers she can rewind time while saving her best friend Chloe Price from a violent altercation. The pair soon find themselves investigating the mysterious disappearance of fellow student.
